categories.title: Distribution & Statistical Plots
categories.description: Visualizations for exploring data distributions, variability, and statistical relationships across experimental conditions.

items.name: Box Plot Analysis
items.description: Statistical distribution visualization showing median, quartiles, and outliers across multiple experimental groups. Ideal for comparing gene expression levels between conditions.

items.name: Violin Plot
items.description: Combines box plot statistics with kernel density estimation to show the full distribution shape. Perfect for visualizing expression patterns in single-cell RNA-seq data.

items.name: Dot Plot Matrix
items.description: Multi-dimensional visualization displaying gene expression levels across different cell types or conditions using size and color encoding for dual-metric representation.

items.name: Single Dot Plot
items.description: Focused dot plot visualization for comparing expression patterns of selected genes across specific cell populations or experimental timepoints.

categories.title: Temporal & Sequential Analysis
categories.description: Time-series and trajectory visualizations for understanding dynamic biological processes and developmental patterns.

items.name: Time Series Line Plot
items.description: Temporal gene expression dynamics across multiple timepoints. Captures expression trajectories during differentiation or treatment response studies.

items.name: Response Curve Analysis
items.description: Dose-response or time-response curves showing biological system reactions to varying stimuli concentrations or temporal exposures.

categories.title: High-Dimensional Data
categories.description: Complex visualizations for multi-dimensional genomic data including dimensional reduction and correlation analyses.

items.name: Scatter Plot Analysis
items.description: High-density scatter plot for exploring relationships between continuous variables. Features regression lines and confidence intervals for correlation analysis.

items.name: UMAP Dimensionality Reduction
items.description: Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection visualization revealing cell clusters and trajectories in single-cell transcriptomic datasets.

items.name: MA Plot
items.description: Log-ratio (M) versus mean expression (A) plot for differential expression analysis. Highlights significantly regulated genes with fold-change thresholds.

categories.title: Circular & Network Visualizations
categories.description: Specialized plots for genomic interactions and circular chromosome representations.

items.name: Circos Plot
items.description: Circular genomic visualization displaying chromosomal rearrangements, copy number variations, and inter-chromosomal interactions from Hi-C or ChIP-seq experiments.
